message.content:
Subject: Resignation Letter - Effective [Date]

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to take a moment to express my gratitude for the opportunities that have allowed me to grow professionally within this organization and also to inform you of my decision to resign from my role effective [date]. 

It has been an honor and privilege to work with such a talented team, and I am truly grateful for all your support as well as the experiences and skills I’ve gained during my tenure here. Please convey my sincerest appreciation to everyone in the organization for their cooperation and assistance over the years. 

I understand that this might come as a surprise, but after careful consideration, I believe it is time for me to pursue other ventures. I want to ensure a smooth transition and will do everything possible to assist in finding and training my replacement. 

Please let me know how best to proceed with handing over my responsibilities and completing my projects. Rest assured, I will remain committed until the end of my tenure to ensuring that there is minimal disruption.

Again, thank you for your understanding and support throughout my journey in this organization. It has been a pleasure working under your leadership and guidance. 

Warm Regards, 
[Your Name]
